amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds to be used to finalize the rule entitled "Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Consumer Water Heaters.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
